text: They will eat, but they will not be satisfied; they will engage in prostitution,4:10. Prostitution here can have various meanings—the basic act of adultery, visiting temple priestesses/prostitutes as part of pagan “worship,” and spiritual prostitution through breaking vows to the true God by following heathen gods. but they will not prosper because they have given up on the Lord to go and prostitute themselves to other gods.
